√psā 'devour'

present: [2.] psā́ti etc.  

[perfect: papsau  psāyāt  pseyāt  apsāsīt  psāsyati  psātā  ]

verbal: psātá  -psā́ya  passive: apsīyata   -- intensive: pāpsā-   -- desiderative: pipsāsa-   -- causative: psāpaya-  

derivatives: psānīya  

Doubtless a secondary root-form, from √bhas.
